admission_related.question: What is the eligibility criteria for admission to Reva University?
admission_related.answer: For admission to Reva University, candidates must qualify JEE Main or state-level entrance exams. Academic requirement: Minimum 60% in 12th with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

fee_related.question: What is the fee structure at Reva University?
fee_related.answer: The annual fee at Reva University for 2025-26 is approximately ₹3,00,000 (tuition) + ₹1,30,000 (hostel & mess) = ₹4,30,000 total per year. Merit scholarships and education loans available.

general_queries.question: Where is Reva University located?
general_queries.answer: Reva University is strategically located with good connectivity to major transportation hubs. The campus provides a conducive environment for learning with access to urban amenities and facilities.

general_queries.question: What facilities are available on campus?
general_queries.answer: Reva University has state-of-the-art laboratories for all engineering branches including Computer Programming Labs with latest software, Electronics & Communication Labs with modern equipment, Mechanical Engineering Workshops with CNC machines, Civil Engineering Labs with testing equipment, Electrical Machines Lab, Physics & Chemistry Labs, CAD/CAM Labs, Robotics Lab, and specialized research laboratories.

academic_related.question: What is the grading system?
academic_related.answer: Reva University follows a credit-based grading system with letter grades (A+, A, B+, B, C+, C, D, F). Grade Point Average (GPA) is calculated on a 10-point scale where A+ = 10, A = 9, B+ = 8, B = 7, C+ = 6, C = 5, D = 4, F = 0. CGPA is the cumulative average of all semester GPAs. Minimum passing grade is D (4.0 points).

infrastructure_related.question: What are the hostel facilities?
infrastructure_related.answer: Reva University provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls with modern amenities including furnished single/double occupancy rooms, high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity, mess facilities with nutritious vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals, laundry services, recreational rooms with TV and games, study halls, 24/7 security with CCTV surveillance, medical facilities, and sports facilities within hostel premises.

infrastructure_related.answer: Reva University has a well-equipped central library with over 50,000 books, journals, and digital resources. Fees.question: What is the fee structure for 2025-26?
Fees.answer: The annual fee at Reva University for 2025-26 is approximately ₹180,000 (tuition) + ₹150,000 (hostel & mess) = ₹360,000 total per year. Merit scholarships and education loans are available. Fee concessions available for economically weaker sections.

Fees.question: Are scholarships available?
Fees.answer: Reva University offers various scholarships including merit-based scholarships for top performers (25-100% fee waiver), need-based scholarships for economically weaker sections (complete fee waiver), government scholarships for SC/ST/OBC students, girl child scholarships, sports scholarships, and external scholarships like Inspire and KVPY.

Admissions.question: What are the important dates for 2025 admission?
Admissions.answer: For Reva University 2025 admissions: Applications start in March 2025, deadline in May 2025. JEE Main sessions: January 24-February 1 and April 1-8, 2025. JEE Advanced: May 18, 2025. Counseling starts in June 2025, and classes begin in August 2025.

Admissions.question: What is the eligibility criteria?
Admissions.answer: For admission to Reva University, candidates must qualify JEE Main/Advanced (for IITs) or state entrance exams. Academic requirement: 75% in 12th (65% for SC/ST) with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics for premier institutes, 60% for others. Age limit: 17-25 years (30 for SC/ST/PwD).

Placements.question: Which companies visit for placements?
Placements.answer: Reva University has established partnerships with companies including TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, Cognizant, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, IBM, L&T Infotech, Mindtree, Mphasis, DXC Technology, and various regional IT and engineering companies.

Placements.question: What is the average package offered?
Placements.answer: The average package at Reva University ranges from ₹4-6 LPA with median around ₹4.5 LPA. Mass recruiters offer ₹3.5-6 LPA while specialized companies provide ₹6-15 LPA. The highest package for 2024 was ₹15 LPA.

Placements.question: What is the placement percentage?
Placements.answer: Reva University maintains excellent placement records with 95% placement rate for IITs, 90% for NITs, and 80% for other colleges. The placement cell provides comprehensive training including resume building, mock interviews, aptitude training, and soft skills development.

faqs.question: What is the academic year for 2025-26?
faqs.answer: The academic year 2025-2026 starts from August 2025.

faqs.question: When are JEE Main 2025 exams?
faqs.answer: JEE Main 2025 Session 1: January 24 - February 1, 2025. Session 2: April 1 - April 8, 2025.

faqs.question: What are the updated fee structures for 2025-26?
faqs.answer: Fee structures have been updated for the 2025-26 academic year. Please check the fees section for detailed information.
